summary: This is a brief internal email regarding the transfer of prisoners, including Jeffrey Epstein, from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (NYM) to a GEO Group facility. It is dated August 8, 2019, the day before Epstein's death, and instructs scheduling the transfer for August 9, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as an inmate to be transferred from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (NYM) to a GEO Group facility on August 9, 2019.

events.title: Scheduled Prisoner Transfer
events.description: Planned transfer of prisoners, including Jeffrey Epstein, from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (NYM) to a GEO Group facility.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated Thursday, August 8, 2019, scheduling a prisoner transfer for the next day, Friday, August 9, 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein is explicitly listed as one of the prisoners to be transferred from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (NYM) to a GEO Group facility.
The instruction includes providing 7 days of medication with the medical summary for the transfer.
This document is dated the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
